name: Talking Bangla Dictionary
description: The leading and largest Bangla dictionary is now available for FREE!  Why should you use Talking Bangla Dictionary?  Full Offline Dictionary  2,20,410 words collection  Basic grammar rules  English & Bangla pronunciation  Word rating system  Google Drive Backup   English to Bangla conversion  Bangla to English conversion  Copy and Paste words  Search image by words  Web search  Share your word through text share to Talking Bangla Dictionary  Basic grammar rule includes :  Sentence  Parts of Speech  Tense  Voice  Right form of verb  Transformation of sentence  Appropriate Preposition  Opportunities dont happen, you just create them. So, learn hard through this smart Bangla Dictionary and create more opportunity. Happy Learning!  Thanks
